ygData.subject: Question of Aesthetics
ygData.msgSnippet: I suppose that is a good enough topic for this question. Last night, I saw a bard playing a song that I thought I had never seen before. I found out that it
ygData.messageBody:
I suppose that is a good enough topic for this question. Last night, I
saw a bard playing a song that I thought I had never seen before. I
found out that it was Selo's, but it looked different than when I play
Selo's. It had the white pulsing flashes, but it also had small purple
lights or something. When does Selo's start to look different? Anyone
know?

Mandibal
Bard from Qeynos
Cazic-Thule

Oh, one last thing - about the Heartstone Saga. I am trying to get
involved in this. I e-mailed the guy who made the post to eqvault (from
the Hand of Chaos), and he has yet to respond to me. Does anyone have
any info on the Heaststone Saga on Cazic-Thule. Information I am
looking for is how do I get involved, and how do I get my guild
involved.

Thanks!
_________________________________________________________
